channel.title: Problems with faceNPC

item.title: Problems with faceNPC
item.dc:creator: @clifton_7 clifton 7
item.description:
@clifton_7 wrote:

I just recently tried adding faceNPC, but im having a little trouble…
After i click away it still faces the person/Npc, causing me to walk backwards and stuff…
PLEASE HELP!

Ill post everything i tried to add…

public void faceNPC(int index) { faceNPC = index; faceNPCupdate = true; updateRequired = true; } protected boolean faceNPCupdate = false; public int faceNPC = -1; public void appendFaceNPCUpdate(stream str) { str.writeWordBigEndian(faceNPC); }

And this stuff i also added…

if(faceNPCupdate) appendFaceNPCUpdate(str);

and…

if(faceNPCupdate) updateMask |= 1;

lastly…

faceNPCupdate = false; faceNPC = 65535;
Im pretty sure its in the right place…
Anything else i might need?
I REALLY need this or i cant have following
ANY IDEAS?-- --I_STILL_NEED_HELP–

Read full topic
